name: Dregs of Grieveth
description:
A short, surreal horror experience.

You play as a pilgrim travelling to the Chapel of Grieveth. Upon arriving, you find that something has corrupted the holy place. Something far beyond your knowing.

Created over the course of 10 days for Scream Jam 2021.

The game doesn't have sound. I didn't have enough time to add it in. Something tells me I might get a 0 in the sound design category for that. Woopsies.

This game is really unfinished. I plan on possibly improving this game after the jam. Just to make it anything other than a silent walking simulator. As of now, what you get is what you get.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to interact

SHIFT to run
